messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Thursday's writing prompt: Alphabet of horrors
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry! I have two addresses that alternate when I type un into the To: space. That was meant for my writing prompts list! ;-) Joyce (So as not to be
messages.messageBody:
Sorry!

I have two addresses that alternate when I type "un" into the To:
space. That was meant for my writing prompts list! ;-)

Joyce

(So as not to be mysterious, it's:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/UnschoolingWriters/
There was some interaction at the beginning, but now it's mostly me
sending out prompts a few times a week.)


On Jun 10, 2010, at 11:05 AM, Joyce Fetteroll wrote:

>
>
> Write an alphabet where each alphabetic monster is bent on alphabetic
> mayhem on the next alphabetic beast. Where the Tentacled Terror tenses
> to tear into the Ulcerated Underdweller who upchucks upon the Venomous
> Villain as he voraciously vilifies ...
>
> Idea from The Absolutely Awful Alphabet by Mordicai Gerstein.
>
> Joyce
> Alphabet of horrors
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
>
>
>



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Thursday's writing prompt: Alphabet of horrors
messages.msgSnippet: Write an alphabet where each alphabetic monster is bent on alphabetic mayhem on the next alphabetic beast. Where the Tentacled Terror tenses to tear into the
messages.messageBody:
Write an alphabet where each alphabetic monster is bent on alphabetic
mayhem on the next alphabetic beast. Where the Tentacled Terror tenses
to tear into the Ulcerated Underdweller who upchucks upon the Venomous
Villain as he voraciously vilifies ...


Idea from The Absolutely Awful Alphabet by Mordicai Gerstein.


Joyce
Alphabet of horrors


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
